description: Timely is an automatic time-tracking platform capturing activity across applications, calendars, and devices, creating detailed timesheets for billing or productivity insights

capabilities.name: TIMELY_CREATE_WEBHOOK
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new webhook for the specified account. Use after specifying the target URL and event subscriptions. Call only once per configuration.

capabilities.name: TIMELY_RETRIEVE_ACCOUNT
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific account by its ID. Use when you need to fetch fresh account info after confirming the ID. Example: "Retrieve account details for account ID 364"
